# CryptLock üîê

Secure file & directory encryption CLI.

## Install
pip install cryptlock

## Usage

Encrypt file:
cryptlock encrypt file.txt --wipe

Decrypt:
cryptlock decrypt file.txt.enc

Encrypt directory:
cryptlock encrypt folder --wipe

## Features
- AES encryption
- Password protection
- Directory support
- Secure wipe
- Progress bar
- Integrity check
